Articles.Content:
After a shorter than anticipated break, I can say that I'm (more or less) back up on the forum. Soon enough, I'll get back to the Renderfarm, hopefully keep it going for a long while.

A few things I'm working on, or planning on working on shortly:

- KSP Parody of "I've Gotta Feeling", *Soon We'll Be Leaving*, in collaboration with UpsilonAerospace. This'll be a fun little parody, hope to show it off soon!
- 1.0 Tribute with ghostbuzzer7. More to come on that.
- A KSP animation. Collaborating with esinohio.

>   
> ![VWP9DRf.gif](http://i.imgur.com/VWP9DRf.gif)  
> ![lGbnm0O.png](http://i.imgur.com/lGbnm0O.png)  
> ![sMZRfI1.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/sMZRfI1.jpg)  
> All of these were rendered in Blender3D.

Plus a few more things on the back burner that might flourish when these are out of the way. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)  

Should be fun, stay tuned! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Sweet! can't wait for that animation!
Welcome back, Starwhip. Honestly, you weren't as inactive as zekes during your "break"; so why did you call it that? Also, pumped up for the things.

Woohoo, the KSP gods have blessed us once more! The great Starwhip has returned, and just in time for the community to get together and celebrate for 1.0! Welcome back, man. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
